fno: In the cash market, the Nifty 50 added 38.10 points or 0.21% to settle at 18,601.50. The NSE's India VIX, a gauge of market's expectation of volatility over the near term, rose 1.12% to 11.25. Infosys, HDFC Bank and Hindustan Aeronautics (HAL) were the top traded individual stock futures contracts in F&O segment of NSE. The June 2023 F&O contracts will expire on 29 June 2023.
